suggestions.original: To improve the realism of the artwork, focus on achieving accurate proportions and detailed textures. Study human anatomy to better represent the figures with realistic proportions and natural poses. Add more detailed textures to the mountains and background elements to create depth and a sense of realism. Use shading and lighting techniques to create shadows and highlights, enhancing the three-dimensionality of the scene. Pay attention to the details in clothing, facial features, and natural elements to make the artwork more lifelike.
